channel.title: Web Development Help
channel.description: i need a tutorial for making a homepage for my forums anyone got one? im a begginer so i need a begginer tutorial.

item.title: Web Development Help
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:2, topic:135072”][quote author=the angel of death link=topic=186510.msg1686531#msg1686531 date=1187578095]
i need a tutorial for making a homepage for my forums anyone got one? im a begginer so i need a begginer tutorial.
[/quote]
get dreamweaver 8, this will help you, thats how i make all my sites[/quote]

Use CS3.

As for learning dreamweaver, search google for tutorials

Read full topic
